heading: Retainer Payment (One Time Payment)
description: You can use this page to make a one-time payment if we have asked you to add to your retainer balance.  You can select the increments needed, and ad them to your cart, to reach the requested amount.  Then checkout using the cart.  These funds will be immediately added  to your account with the firm.

heading: Know Your Rights When Dealing with Law Enforcement
description: It is important for all of us, regardless of immigration status, to know how to exercise our rights if we are stopped by local police or immigration authorities. We all know that in many parts of our country, there is not a lot of racial or ethnic diversity
